Turn around your 2020 in 21 days...
 Do the 21 Day Meditation Challenge!
 In these 21 days you'll discover that meditation is effortless and rewarding when done under the right guidance.
 A simple 10 minute guided meditation for beginners by Gurudev Sri Sri Ravi Shankar.
 Learn how to meditate in this video and enjoy the power of meditation.
 Meditating daily will improve your immunity, reduce stress levels, reduce anxiety, and mental clarity.
